DOC.brief_summary: This trial conduct Europe . The aim trial investigate difference frequency episodes hypoglycaemia treatment biphasic insulin aspart 30 compare biphasic human insulin 30 subject well control type 2 diabetes .
DOC.brief_title: Frequency Episodes Hypoglycaemia During Treatment With Biphasic Insulin Aspart 30 Type 2 Diabetes
DOC.mesh_term: Insulin degludec , insulin aspart drug combination
Insulin aspart , insulin aspart protamine drug combination 30:70
DOC.criteria: Type 2 diabetes Treated insulin 13 injection daily least 6 month Body Mass Index ( BMI ) 40 kg/m^2 HbA1c ( glycosylated haemoglobin A1c ) 9.5 % screen Total insulin dosage 1.8 IU/kg Impaired hepatic renal function significant cardiac problem
